about_the_game:
Colors Live is a powerful and fun painting game integrated with a vibrant online community.

packed with painting features
  • an interface that takes five minutes to learn
  • tons of different brushes
  • up to ten layers
  • export still images and timelapse videos
  • undo, eyedropper, opacity, blending, flip, and much more!

introducing a brand-new painting challenge mode, colors quest!
  • designed for beginners and masters alike, colors quest encourages you to spend a little time painting every day to level up your skills

access the online gallery, directly from colors live!
  • share paintings and make friends with other artists from around the world! admire the 5 million paintings already created by the community, each with a unique painting playback
